segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and it’s making such a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right there, but she’s not doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, and the floor is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for whoever has to clean this up later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are adding to the chaos by climbing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl is just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just so messy and out of control.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and it’s only going to get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the faucet and stop the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a sad sight to see.
segments.speaker: PAR
